summary: Implements a deprecated diffusion-based image inpainting pipeline that combines a UNet denoiser with a RePaint scheduler to iteratively reconstruct masked regions of input images, handling preprocessing, inference, and output generation.
business_intent: Offer developers a ready-to-use, backwardâ€‘compatible tool for restoring missing or corrupted parts of images through diffusion techniques, facilitating integration into applications that require advanced image editing capabilities.
